examples: He left the company two years ago.
I saw her a week ago at the party.
The concert happened five months ago.
Él dejó la compañía hace dos años.
La vi hace una semana en la fiesta.
El concierto sucedió hace cinco meses.

suggested: Do you remember the days of yore? That was ages ago.
I cannot wait for the new season of my favorite show to come out. It feels like it was ages ago that I last watched it.
What was life like centuries ago?
Looking back at how things were ten years ago, it's amazing to see how much has changed.
It's hard to believe that it was only a few months ago when we could travel freely without any restrictions.
If only I had taken that opportunity when it was presented to me. That was many years ago.
The feeling of nostalgia that comes over me when I think about my childhood home, which I left long ago.
